Summary: Vertical light beam over Port Phillip Bay.
divs: Sighting DetailsPlaying ball(fetch) with my dog outside my house I noticed a beam of light coming from distant clouds, it did not illuminate the clouds. It was after sunset and it was the brightest area in the sky at the time. A cloudy sky at the time did not appear to disrupt the beam, and the light faded away as the clouds cleared that spot. It was insight and did not flicker or change appearance for the 15 minutes I observed it. we live not far from a Hospital and frequently have helicopters taking patients from there to Melbourne the light was as bright as the searchlight they use but it remained stationary. I hope someone else witnessed this other than my wife and I.
trends: There have been 40 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around May 23rd 2009
